snippet.title: BasketBelle - Trailer 2
snippet.description:
This is a gameplay trailer for BasketBelle, available now at http://basketbelle.net !

BasketBelle is a 2D experimental basketball puzzle platformer set in current day Paris. Each Chapter of the game uses the mechanics and idea of basketball in a different way. At one point you might be dribbling inside the intestines of a purple blob creature (what?). At others, you're likely to be dunking above the clouds in front of the Parisian moon. It gets a little weird, and I like that.

The game will be releasing soon! My Twitter is the best place for all upcoming news / announcements, as well as my website, both linked below:

Follow me on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/onemrbean
More of my games: http://www.onemrbean.com

I did the programming, art, design, and music for BasketBelle (like what you're hearing now!), with help from friends all along the way.

Old teaser trailer for BasketBelle: http://youtu.be/WHb1uZK9LUI

:D
